data.name: ExceptionBadFileStorageDirectoryDoesNotExist
data.value: The 'bad file' storage directory is inaccessible. The service has been disabled.

data.value: Cancellation of at least one of the specified items has failed.

data.value: Cannot delete the specified study (StudyInstanceUid = {0}) because it could not be found in the data store.

data.value: Cannot perform deletion while reindex is in progress.

data.name: ExceptionCannotReindexWhileDeletionIsInProgress
data.value: Cannot perform a reindex operation while a deletion is in progress.

data.value: Cannot start a new import operation while reindex is still running.

data.value: The specified drive '{0}' is not available or does not exist.

data.value: An error occurred while attempting to refresh the Local Data Store activities.
